title: Establishes city and county property tax relief exemptions
summary: Establishes both a city state-supported tax relief, CitySTAR, and a county state-supported, CountySTAR, real property tax exemption; provides eligibility criteria therefor and formula for determining amount of exemption.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing a city state-supported tax relief exemption and a county state-supported tax relief exemption
